009
010package imagingbook.pub.sift;
011
012
013import java.util.Locale;
014
015import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
016
017/**
018 * SIFT descriptor.
019 * Added magnitude field and Comparable interface for easy sorting.
020 * 2020/10/04: Added scale level for display reasons.
021 * 
022 * @author W. Burger
023 * @version 2020/10/04
024 */
025public class SiftDescriptor implements Pnt2d, Comparable<SiftDescriptor> {
026        
027        private final double x; // image position
028        private final double y;
029        private final int scaleLevel;
030        private final double scale;
031        private final double magnitude;
032        private final double orientation;
033        private final int[] features;
034        
035        public double getX() {
036                return x;
037        }
038
039        public double getY() {
040                return y;
041        }
042
043        public double getScale() {
044                return scale;
045        }
046        
047        public int getScaleLevel() {
048                return scaleLevel;
049        }
050        
051        public double getMagnitude() {
052                return magnitude;
053        }
054
055        public double getOrientation() {
056                return orientation;
057        }
058        public int[] getFeatures() {
059                return features;
060        }
061
062        public SiftDescriptor(double x, double y, double scale, int scaleLevel, double magnitude, double orientation, int[] features) {
063                this.x = x;
064                this.y = y;
065                this.scale = scale;
066                this.scaleLevel = scaleLevel;
067                this.magnitude = magnitude;
068                this.orientation = orientation;
069                this.features = features;
070        }
071        
072        // -----------------------------
073        
074        public double getDistanceL1(SiftDescriptor other) {
075                int[] f1 = this.features;
076                int[] f2 = other.features;
077                int sum = 0;
078                for (int i=0; i<f1.length; i++) {
079                        sum = sum + Math.abs(f1[i] - f2[i]);
080                }
081                return sum;
082        }
083        
084        public double getDistanceL2(SiftDescriptor other) {
085                int[] f1 = this.features;
086                int[] f2 = other.features;
087                int sum = 0;
088                for (int i = 0; i < f1.length; i++) {
089                        int d = f1[i] - f2[i];
090                        sum = sum + d * d;
091                }
092                return Math.sqrt(sum);
093        }
094        
095        public double getDistanceLinf(SiftDescriptor other) {
096                int[] f1 = this.features;
097                int[] f2 = other.features;
098                int dmax = 0;
099                for (int i = 0; i < f1.length; i++) {
100                        int d = Math.abs(f1[i] - f2[i]);
101                        dmax = Math.max(dmax, d);
102                }
103                return dmax;
104        }
105        
106        // -----------------------------
107        
108        public String toString() {
109                return String.format(Locale.US, 
110                                "x=%.1f y=%.1f s=%.2f mag=%.4f angle=%.2f", 
111                                x, y, scale, magnitude, orientation);
112        }
113
114        //used for sorting SIFT descriptors by magnitude
115        public int compareTo(SiftDescriptor d2) {
116                if (this.magnitude > d2.magnitude) return -1;
117                if (this.magnitude < d2.magnitude) return 1;
118                else return 0;
119        }
120
121
122
123}
